Html:
hi i installed KiGG 2.2 on my comp.

 

i followed all the instructions from the text file. am using VS2008 and integrated web server.

but when i run the soultion, webpage is loading with directory browsing.

i have no idea which is the start page, and make the app run.

can anyone please help :)

 

thanks in advance.

hey i solved this, i was always looking for http://localhost:49731 .

solved it by using http://localhost:49731/kigg

:)
